yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Lucky Town | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="Created more quickly and easily than Human Touch, its companion album, Lucky Town runs the gamut from the rocking title track to the soft and soul-searching "My Beautiful Reward."" />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />
<link rel="canonical" href="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/lucky-town/" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="en_US" />
<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:title" content="Lucky Town" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Created more quickly and easily than Human Touch, its companion album, Lucky Town runs the gamut from the rocking title track to the soft and soul-searching "My Beautiful Reward." Much of the songwriting is autobiographical, from "Local Hero" to the masterful "Living Proof," written after the birth of Springsteen's first son." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/lucky-town/" />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="Bruce Springsteen" />

	<meta property="og:image:width" content="1200" />

	<meta property="og:image:type" content="image/jpeg" />
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<meta name="twitter:title" content="Lucky Town" />
<meta name="twitter:description" content="Created more quickly and easily than Human Touch, its companion album, Lucky Town runs the gamut from the rocking title track to the soft and soul-searching "My Beautiful Reward." Much of the songwriting is autobiographical, from "Local Hero" to the masterful "Living Proof," written after the birth of Springsteen's first son." />
<meta name="twitter:image" content="https://cdn-p.smehost.net/sites/e8622626f9584d40b1a8fce8dfa6f567/wp-content/uploads/1992/03/og-springsteen-lucky-town-front.jpg" />
<meta name="twitter:site" content="@springsteen" />

yoast_head_json.title: Lucky Town | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: Created more quickly and easily than Human Touch, its companion album, Lucky Town runs the gamut from the rocking title track to the soft and soul-searching "My Beautiful Reward."
yoast_head_json.og_description: Created more quickly and easily than Human Touch, its companion album, Lucky Town runs the gamut from the rocking title track to the soft and soul-searching "My Beautiful Reward." Much of the songwriting is autobiographical, from "Local Hero" to the masterful "Living Proof," written after the birth of Springsteen's first son.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: Created more quickly and easily than Human Touch, its companion album, Lucky Town runs the gamut from the rocking title track to the soft and soul-searching "My Beautiful Reward." Much of the songwriting is autobiographical, from "Local Hero" to the masterful "Living Proof," written after the birth of Springsteen's first son.
